pages.text: A basic Summoner has no moving pieces. It works exclusively via the draw of the Soulbook through the lattice of endersteel. As you might expect, this is a very slow process.$(p)However, I've discovered that I can create gears from bones and Endersteel, or ender bones and iron.

Simply putting one of these $(item)Oscillating Gears$() into a summoner will improve its $(thing)Soulus Flow$() (rate of soul transfer). It will, by itself (likely due to the $(thing)Souletic Field$()) move into a suitable place inside the Summoner, attaching itself to the inner workings and improving the flow.

pages.title: Other Upgrades
pages.text: $(l:processing/skewer)The next chapter will detail a contraption you can use to kill creatures more easily$(), in order to collect their bones or blood in the continual pursuit of restoring Animalia.
